update.name: FileBot 4.7.5
update.title: New updates available
update.message:
FileBot 4.7.5
This release features:
+ Keyboard shortcuts for calling user-defined Presets (Numpad 1..9)
+ Improved episode auto-detection
+ Improved file sort order
+ Improved bindings: {plex}, {t}, {votes}, {group} and {tags}
+ Reduce xattr metadata size
+ Lots of bugfixes
